noun.description: An Italian-American savory pastry typically made with pizza dough and filled with meat, cheese, and other ingredients.
examples: we ordered the veggie lasagna and a classic stromboli

proper noun.description: A volcanic island in the Mediterranean, the most northeasterly of the Lipari Islands.

origin: 1950s: apparently named after the 1950 film Stromboli, set on the Italian island of Stromboli.
